name: Toast.Description
description: A message that appears on the screen to provide feedback on an action.
description_zh: A message that appears on the screen to provide feedback on an action.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。
